summary: A newly hired cop from Naples, with a past in music studies, gets recruited for a special mission as a pianist for a band close to a mob boss.
cast: Alessandro Roja|Giampaolo Morelli|Serena Rossi|Paolo Sassanelli|Peppe Servillo|Ciro Petrone|Franco Ricciardi|Ivan Granatino|Carlo Buccirosso|Antonio Pennarella|Antonio Cossia|Juliet Esey Joseph|Pasquale Riccio|Marco Mario de Notaris|Roberta Liguori|Antonio Buonomo|Maria Raffaella Faggiano|Antonio Austro|Stefania Barca|Stefano Barca|Michele Cantalupo|Salvatore Cantalupo|Claudio Caruso|Antonello Cossia|Bruno De Rosa|Francesco Di Sarno|Rosa Diletto|Camilla Esposito|Gaetano Esposito|Vincenzo Esposito|Antonio Fiorillo|Vincenzo Fiorillo|Carlo Granata|Ernesta Illiano|Susy Irollo|Lorenzo La Neve|Marco Liguori|Flavio Massimo|Chiara Matese|Ciccio Merolla|Stefano Moffa|Giovanni Napolitano|Annamaria Pecoraro|Claudia Federica Petrella|Tuono Pettinato|Oreste Pipolo|Pio Luigi Piscicelli|Emanuele Puolo|Vincenzo Puolo|Ciro Rainone|Umberto Riccio|Patrizia Romano|Marco Salvato|Gian Paolo Saporito|Maria Strazzullo|Luisa Troia
keywords: police officer|undercover police|police chase|police officer killed|police officer knocked down by vehicle
title: Song 'e Napule
